title: Chapter Metadata Schema
description: Schema for validating YAML frontmatter in Docusaurus chapter Markdown files.

week.description: The week number in the course schedule this chapter is covered.

module.description: The ID of the module this chapter belongs to (e.g., '01-introduction').

prerequisites.description: List of required prior knowledge or chapters.

learning_objectives.description: Specific learning objectives for this chapter.

sidebar_label.description: The label to display in the Docusaurus sidebar.

assessment_type.description: Type of assessment associated with the chapter.

capstone_component.description: True if this chapter contributes to the capstone project.

title.description: The title of the chapter. Often derived from H1 in Markdown but can be explicitly set.
